name: Race Shoot
description: This is a simple 2D top down car racing, with shoot ability, your goal is just win the race at least at 3th position, the count of race and wins (at 1, 2 or 3) will be recorded, you can see it in "Race Stats" on home screen. Collect bullet, shield, and nitro on the road and stay away from oil that retard you. If you want to race in fast mode, ignore oil, and can collect nitro from longer radius, you can watch the ads to unlock these features.
